HAIDE.AT.summary: Haidemenos S.A. operates as a printing company in Greece and rest of Europe. It offers commercial printing services on various products, including magazines, company leaflets, newspaper and magazine inserts, advertisements leaflets, books, cards, calendars, maps, tourist leaflets, cartolines, and boxes. The company also provides digital printing services; and silk-screen printing services on various materials, including paper, PVC, cloth, etc. In addition, it is involved in printing posters-banners of various sizes, which primarily include billboard posters that are used for the advertisement and promotion of products, events, etc. The company serves publishing companies, tobacco industries, banks, public organizations, food-beverage companies, supermarkets, airport companies, furniture companies, car industries, clothing companies, cosmetics industry, telecommunications and IT companies, jewelry companies, hotels, etc. directly or through advertising agencies. Haidemenos S.A. was founded in 1976 and is based in Athens, Greece.

HEXEY.long_name: Hellenic Exchanges - Athens Stock Exchange SA
HEXEY.summary: Hellenic Exchanges - Athens Stock Exchange SA provides support services for the operation of Greek capital market. It operates equities and derivatives markets, and the alternative market; and performs clearing and settlement of trades, as well as develops tools. The company is involved in the management of clearing systems and central counterparty; and finalizing, reconciling, or settling the finalization of transactions in financial instruments, as well as operates as a system administrator in the Athens Exchange Clearing House. It engages in carrying out commercial activities to promote and provide IT services and use/broadcast market data, as well as in general the promotion, distribution, support, monitoring, operation and commercial exploitation of products, systems and customized software applications based on corresponding licenses to resell and commercially exploit. In addition, the company offers listing, trading, clearing, settlement, registry, market data, and depository services, as well as engages in distribution of dividends, interest payment, distribution of securities, and intermediation in the transfer of options or stock options. The company was formerly known as Hellenic Exchanges S.A. and changed its name to Hellenic Exchanges - Athens Stock Exchange SA in December 2013. Hellenic Exchanges - Athens Stock Exchange SA was founded in 1876 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

HLL.F.summary: Ellaktor S.A., through its subsidiaries, engages in the construction and quarrying, real estate development and management, wind power, environment, and concession businesses. The company constructs bridges, motorways, metro projects, biological treatment plants, natural gas pipelines, refineries, shopping centers, casinos, tourist and hotel units, cultural centers, hospitals, airports, Olympic and athletic complexes, railway projects, tunnels, dams, port projects, energy production stations, electromechanical projects, etc.; and logistics, office, residential, industrial, and educational buildings. It is also involved in the waste management and energy production, which include design, construction, and operation of waste treatment plant, as well as offers alternative fuel production and biomass exploitation projects. In addition, the company develops, constructs, and operates wind farms; provides real estate development and services, which consists of retail parks, entertainment centers, residential complexes, exhibition centers, and offices and mixed use buildings; and provides consultancy and services to third parties. Ellaktor S.A. operates in Greece, other European countries, Gulf countries, the Americas, Africa, and Australia. The company was formerly known as ELLINIKI TECHNODOMIKI TEB SA and changed its name to Ellaktor S.A. in 2008. Ellaktor S.A. is based in Athens, Greece.  As per the transaction announced on January 8, 2021, Ellaktor S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Reggeborgh Invest B.V.

HLPN.F.summary: Hellenic Petroleum S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates in the energy sector primarily in Greece, South Eastern Europe, and the East Mediterranean. The company operates through the Refining, Marketing, Exploration and Production of Hydrocarbons, Petro-chemicals, Gas and Power, and Other segments. It engages in the supply, refining, and trading of petroleum products; marketing of fuels; production and trading of petrochemicals/chemicals; exploration and production of oil and gas; and generation and trading of power. It is also involved in the production, distribution, and trading of renewable energy sources; provision of financing and other financial services; retail trade of liquid fuels and LPG; operation of tankers; exploration and production of hydrocarbons; trade, distribution, and storage of oil products; operation of crude oil pipelines; owning of vessels; production and marketing of polypropylene, BOPP films, and solvents; trading of imported plastics and chemicals; and provision of treasury services. In addition, the company provides consulting and engineering services, as well as participates in the development of cross-border gas pipelines. Hellenic Petroleum S.A. operates a network of 1,738 service stations, 15 fuel storage and distribution facilities, 23 aircraft refueling stations in the Greek airports, 2 LPG bottling plants, and 1 lubricant production and packing site in Greece. Hellenic Petroleum S.A. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Maroussi, Greece.

HLTOF.summary: Hellenic Telecommunications Organization S.A., together with its subsidiaries, provides telecommunications and related services to businesses and individuals primarily in Greece and Romania. It operates through OTE, COSMOTE Group, TELEKOM ROMANIA, and Other segments. The company offers fixed-line, Internet access, and ICT services; and international carrier and TV production services. It also provides mobile and satellite telecommunication, electronic money, e-commerce, financing, consultancy and security, real estate, insurance brokerage, training, wholesale telephony, retail, marketing, overdue accounts management, wholesale broadband, and infrastructure services. The company was founded in 1949 and is based in Athens, Greece.

HLTOY.summary: Hellenic Telecommunications Organization S.A., together with its subsidiaries, provides telecommunications and related services to businesses and individuals primarily in Greece and Romania. It operates through OTE, COSMOTE Group, TELEKOM ROMANIA, and Other segments. The company offers fixed-line, Internet access, and ICT services; and international carrier and TV production services. It also provides mobile and satellite telecommunication, electronic money, e-commerce, financing, consultancy and security, real estate, insurance brokerage, training, wholesale telephony, retail, marketing, overdue accounts management, wholesale broadband, and infrastructure services. The company was founded in 1949 and is based in Athens, Greece.

HTO.AT.summary: Hellenic Telecommunications Organization S.A., together with its subsidiaries, provides telecommunications and related services to businesses and individuals primarily in Greece and Romania. It operates through OTE, COSMOTE Group, TELEKOM ROMANIA, and Other segments. The company offers fixed-line, Internet access, and ICT services; and international carrier and TV production services. It also provides mobile and satellite telecommunication, electronic money, e-commerce, financing, consultancy and security, real estate, insurance brokerage, training, wholesale telephony, retail, marketing, overdue accounts management, wholesale broadband, and infrastructure services. The company was founded in 1949 and is based in Athens, Greece.

IASO.AT.summary: IASO S.A. operates hospitals, and a recovery and rehabilitation center in Europe. The company offers obstetrics and gynecology services, including gynecological oncology, endoscopic surgery, and pediatric and juvenile gynecology services, as well as delivery and operating rooms. It also provides diagnostics and therapeutics services comprising neonatal audiology; endocrinology, diabetes, and osteoporosis; and medical imaging, fetal medicine-gynecological ultrasounds, recurrent spontaneous abortions, neonatal cardiology, central laboratories, radiation oncology, breast center, cytology, urodynamics, medical oncology, surgical pathology, neonatal pediatrics, thyroid surgery department, and nuclear medicines, as well as plastic, reconstructive, and cosmetic surgery/laser services. In addition, the company offers outpatient department services, such as angiology, autoimmune rheumatic diseases and pregnancy, cardiology, check-up, colposcopy unit, dermatology, E.N.T, headache, hematology, nutritional support and dietetics, pediatric and adolescent gynecology, and male genito-urethral plastic surgery unit services, as well as endocrinology, diabetes, and osteoporosis services. Further, it operates intensive care, neonatal intensive care, and assisted reproduction units. IASO S.A. was founded in 1996 and is based in Athens, Greece. IASO S.A. is a subsidiary of Ocm Luxembourg Healthcare Greece S.Ã R.L.

IATR.AT.summary: Athens Medical Center S.A., together with its subsidiaries, owns and operates nursing units in Greece and Romania. It operates heart center, check up, PET/CT, vascular surgery, hematological, hemodialysis - artificial kidney unit, radiology, radiation therapy, and allergic, cardiac surgery, oncology, orthopedic, obstetrics Â gynecology, and robotic surgery departments. It owns and operates 7 nursing units with a total of 1,200 beds in Athens and Thessaloniki, as well as 4 diagnostic centers in Romania. Athens Medical Center S.A. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

IJ6.SG.summary: Avax S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a construction company in Greece and internationally. It operates through four segments: Construction, Concessions, Energy, and Other Activities. The company constructs civil engineering projects, including airports, banks, buildings, education facilities, garages, hospitals, hotels, Olympic sports facilities, special projects, sports facilities, and other civil engineering projects. It also constructs energy and industrial projects, such as environmental plants; natural gas and petrochemical projects; and power plant projects; and infrastructure projects, such as bridges, harbors, railroads, roads, and other infrastructure projects. In addition, the company is involved in activities focusing on the residential development-urban and country/holiday homes and investing in commercial real estate; and vehicle technical inspection, and facility management services. The company was formerly known as J&P-AVAX S.A. and changed its name to Avax S.A. in April 2019. Avax S.A. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Marousi, Greece.

IKTIN.AT.long_name: Iktinos Hellas S.A. Greek Marble Industry Technical and Touristic Company
IKTIN.AT.summary: Iktinos Hellas S.A. Greek Marble Industry Technical and Touristic Company quarries, cuts, and processes marbles in Greece, the Euro Area, and internationally. The company operates through Marble, Wind Energy, and Real Estate segments. It imports and trades in marbles, granites, and rare decorative stones; and operates as a dealer for artificial rocks and fine mosaics made of natural rocks. The company also offers natural stones, including natural Greek marbles, natural imported marbles, granites, and onyx; synthetic materials, such as quarellas; and other decorative materials comprising travertino, sandstone, psammite, limestone, slate, graphite, glass stone, and gemstone. In addition, it engages in the aeolian energy and real estate businesses. Iktinos Hellas S.A. Greek Marble Industry Technical and Touristic Company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

ILYDA.AT.summary: Ilyda SA engages in software development business in Greece. It offers enterprise resource planning systems, such as MegaTron ERP and Kinitron Smart ERP; Dioscourides Smart, Dioscourides XPress, and Dioscourides ERP Retail System for pharmacies; MegaTron Pharma ERP for drugstores; and LIS Bio-Diagnosis for microbiological laboratories. The company also provides MegaTron DEVA for water supply/sewerage companies; PSIS Financial Management for public sector companies; PSIS Payroll & Personnel Management for legal entities; and SIS Secretariats of Educational Institutions for educational institutions. In addition, it provides software support services, such as telephone support, remote support, on-site support, and feedback support services; project design and implementation; and software training services. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

INKAT.AT.long_name: Intracom Constructions Societe Anonyme Technical and Steel Constructions
INKAT.AT.summary: Intracom Constructions Societe Anonyme Technical and Steel Constructions engages in the construction business in Europe and internationally. The company operates through Constructions and Steel Structures segments. It offers infrastructure projects, such as airport, road, rail road, water engineering, and marine projects; and buildings that include offices, professional infrastructures, shopping centers, educational and cultural buildings, hospitals, health centers, sports venues, and stadiums. The company also provides develops real estate properties, such as villas and boutique hotels; and undertakes industrial facilities for industrial projects and logistics buildings. In addition, it operates motorways, broadband, integrated passenger information systems, waste management, and parking services through public private partnership, and built transfer and operate agreements; and undertakes telecommunication projects, including broadband networks, mobile telephony base stations and networks, wireless transmission systems, and specialized projects, as well as maintenance services. Further, the company provides solid and waste management projects that include waste management, soil remediation and regeneration, water refinery, and waste water treatment. Additionally, it undertakes projects of wind farms, photovoltaic parks, and natural gases. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Paiania, Greece. Intracom Constructions Societe Anonyme Technical and Steel Constructions is a subsidiary of Intracom Holdings S.A.

INLOT.AT.long_name: Intralot S.A. Integrated Lottery Systems and Services
INLOT.AT.summary: Intralot S.A. Integrated Lottery Systems and Services supplies integrated gaming and transaction processing systems, game content, sports betting management, and interactive gaming services to state-licensed gaming organizations worldwide. The company supplies hardware and software, including gaming machines, central computer systems, gaming software, communication systems, etc., as well as offers installation, technical support, and maintenance services to lotteries. It is also involved in the design, organization, and/or management of games; advertising and sales promotion activities; establishment of sales network; and provision of risk management for fixed odds games, etc., as well as game operating services. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

INTEK.AT.summary: IDEAL Group S.A. distributes white electrical appliances, information technology products, and lighting products in Greece. It offers home appliances, including cookers, refrigerators, washing machines, hoods, freezers, kitchen appliances, dishwashers, washing machines, washer-dryers, dryers, microwave ovens, refrigerators, and TVs. The company also provides information technology products comprising laptops, tablets, hard drives, and security products; batteries; professional and domestic lighting; and B2B products, such as application security, disaster recovery and encryption, endpoint security, network access, network security, systems management and reporting, and unified communications products, as well as call centers and other telecommunications equipment, and network management equipment. In addition, it offers customer communication management software; i-DOCS, a business application, which manages transactional database; and digital security services. The company offers its products under the Toshiba, Liebherr, Fourlis, KÃ¶rting, TurboAir, Brandt, Alcatel-Lucent Enterprise, Fortinet, ESET, Kaspersky Lab, Trend Micro, ZTE, and Allot Communications brands. The company was formerly known as Ideal Standard Refractories S.A. and changed its name to IDEAL Group S.A. in 1991. IDEAL Group S.A. was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

INTET.AT.summary: Intertech S.A. Inter. Technologies distributes technology products in Greece. It operates as a distributor of various brands, such as Panasonic, iLuv, Ricoh, Gestetner, and Satellite. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Elliniko, Greece. Intertech S.A. Inter. Technologies was formerly a subsidiary of Demco Group.

INTRK.AT.summary: Intracom Holdings S.A. operates as an IT solutions and services company. The company offers consulting, implementing, outsourcing, communication, and integration services to public, banking, telecommunication, transportation, and healthcare industries, as well as EU institutions. It also engages in the civil engineering, infrastructure, telecom network, renewable energy, and environmental construction, as well as real estate development activities. In addition, the company offers defense and security communication products comprising wideband radios, intercommunication systems, and satellite communication products; data link, telemetry devices, and cryptographic equipment, and as well as terminal and radio accessories; hybrid power stations, generator fuel saving systems, and energy storage systems; and turn-key homeland security solutions. Further, it operates a 21MW wind farm. Intracom Holdings S.A. was founded in 1977 and is based in Paiania, Greece.

IRLTF.long_name: Intralot S.A. Integrated Lottery Systems and Services
IRLTF.summary: Intralot S.A. Integrated Lottery Systems and Services supplies integrated gaming and transaction processing systems, game content, sports betting management, and interactive gaming services to state-licensed gaming organizations worldwide. The company supplies hardware and software, including gaming machines, central computer systems, gaming software, communication systems, etc., as well as offers installation, technical support, and maintenance services to lotteries. It is also involved in the design, organization, and/or management of games; advertising and sales promotion activities; establishment of sales network; and provision of risk management for fixed odds games, etc., as well as game operating services. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.
