The company offers marine transportation services for national, major, and other independent oil companies and refiners under long, medium, and short-term charters. As of April 2, 2020, it operated a fleet of 65 double-hull vessels. The company was formerly known as MIF Limited and changed its name to Tsakos Energy Navigation Limited in July 2001. Tsakos Energy Navigation Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Athens, Greece.

TOPS.summary: Top Ships Inc. owns and operates tanker vessels worldwide. The company's medium range tanker vessels transport crude oil, petroleum products, and bulk liquid chemicals. As of December 31, 2019, it had a fleet with a total capacity of 714,000 deadweight tonnes (dwt) consisting of eight 50,000 dwt product/chemical tankers, such as the M/T Stenaweco Energy, M/T Stenaweco Evolution, M/T Nord Valiant, M/T Stenaweco Excellence, the M/T Eco California, the M/T Eco Marina Del Ray, The M/T Eco Los Angeles, and the M/T Eco City of Angels; and two 157,000 dwt Suezmax tankers, including the M/T Eco Bel Air and M/T Eco Beverly Hills. The company was formerly known as Top Tankers Inc. and changed its name to Top Ships Inc. in December 2007. Top Ships Inc. was founded in 2000 and is based in Maroussi, Greece.

TPEIR.AT.summary: Piraeus Financial Holdings S.A. provides banking products and services in Greece and internationally. It offers time, structured, saving, current, and business accounts; mortgage, consumer, personal, home improvement, farming, restructuring, and working capital loans; overdrafts; and credit, debit, and prepaid cards. The company also provides mutual funds, treasury bonds, equities, exchange traded funds, dual currency deposits, treasury interest-bearing notes, asset management solutions, and gold sovereigns and gold bars; and car, home, civil liability, health, endowment, accident/life, lifestyle, agricultural, civil liability, photovoltaic park, and corporate insurance products. In addition, it offers financial planning, payment/remittance, bills of exchange collection, cash management, import-export settlement, payroll, foreign exchange, risk management, letters of guarantee, factoring, leasing, and Web banking services. Further, the company manages industrial and city link areas; assesses and collects commercial debts; and offers venture capital fund and yachting management services. Additionally, it provides shopping center's management, hotel training and seminars consulting, vehicle trading, financial and consulting, and payroll and labor affairs consulting services, as well as generates renewable energy. The company operates food and entertainment halls; and provides stock exchange, property development/holding and management, logistic center, real estate sale and purchase, debt securities issuance, telecommunication and IT, travel rental, wind energy park exploitation, real estate development and investment management, and investment advisory services. It operates 524 branches and 1,886 ATMs. The company was formerly known as Piraeus Bank S.A. Piraeus Financial Holdings S.A. was founded in 1916 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece. Piraeus Financial Holdings S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Hellenic Financial Stability Fund.

TQZA.SG.summary: Technical Olympic S.A. engages in the construction, marina management, and other businesses in Greece and internationally. Technical Olympic S.A. was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

TRASTOR.AT.long_name: Trastor Real Estate Investment Company SA
TRASTOR.AT.summary: Trastor Real Estate Investment Company SA operates as a property investment company in Greece. Its property portfolio includes shops, offices, gas stations, and garages. The company was formerly known as Piraeus Real Estate Investment Company and changed its name to Trastor Real Estate Investment Company SA in May 2009. Trastor Real Estate Investment Company is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

UERX.F.summary: Top Ships Inc. owns and operates tanker vessels worldwide. The company's medium range tanker vessels transport crude oil, petroleum products, and bulk liquid chemicals. As of December 31, 2019, it had a fleet with a total capacity of 714,000 deadweight tonnes (dwt) consisting of eight 50,000 dwt product/chemical tankers, such as the M/T Stenaweco Energy, M/T Stenaweco Evolution, M/T Nord Valiant, M/T Stenaweco Excellence, the M/T Eco California, the M/T Eco Marina Del Ray, The M/T Eco Los Angeles, and the M/T Eco City of Angels; and two 157,000 dwt Suezmax tankers, including the M/T Eco Bel Air and M/T Eco Beverly Hills. The company was formerly known as Top Tankers Inc. and changed its name to Top Ships Inc. in December 2007. Top Ships Inc. was founded in 2000 and is based in Maroussi, Greece.

VARG.AT.summary: Varangis Avepe S.A. designs, manufactures, and sells furniture and home interior products in Greece. The company provides home furniture products, including seating products, beds, tables, case furniture, occasional tables, upholstered pieces, and accessories, as well as textiles comprising duvets, pillowcases, sheets, bedspreads, blankets, throws, terry towels, bathrobes, pajamas, table linens, kitchen towels, aprons, details, and various accessories under the Lexington brand. It also offers office furniture products comprising acoustic paneling system, meeting, storage system, demountable partition system, group seating, workstation, task chair, and executive and lounge seating furniture, as well as reception and conference/theater/lecture hall furniture products. In addition, the company is involved in the development and implementation of custom designs, including work environments, as well as professional space solutions in partnership with various firms, architectural materials, and historic building restoration and turnkey interior architecture projects in the European Union, the Balkans, and the Persian Gulf. It serves customers in the turnkey projects consisting of professional spaces, banking institutions, retail networks, conference facilities, landmark buildings, hotels, and luxurious mega-yacht interiors. The company was founded in 1900 and is headquartered in Marousi, Greece.

VARNH.AT.summary: Varvaressos S.A. European Spinning Mills produces and sells yarns. The company offers yarns from cellulosic man-made fibers, blended yarns, and cotton yarns, as well as multicount yarns, slub yarns, and core spun yarns. It sells its products in 20 countries. The company was formerly known as Varvaressos S.A. Naoussa Spinning Mill and changed its name to Varvaressos S.A. European Spinning Mills in January 2003. Varvaressos S.A. European Spinning Mills was incorporated in 1974 and is based in Naousa, Greece.

VIDAVO.AT.summary: Vidavo S.A. designs, develops, and provides connected health, wellness, and healthy ageing solutions. The company offers Vida24, a cloud based platform and customizable app that synchs multi-source data. Its platform provides chronic disease management, doctor on demand, nutrition management, e-health and wellness, marine telemedicine, behavioral change, insurance, personal development, scientific wellness, and digital therapeutic solutions. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Thessaloniki, Greece.

VOSYS.AT.summary: Vogiatzoglou Systems S.A. provides products and solutions for store and warehouse furnishing in Greece. The company offers warehouse shelves and equipment, including pallet racks, drive in products, push backs, radio shuttles, live storage products, cantilevers, mezzanines, mezzanine and light duty shelves, and mobile archives; retail store equipment, such as super market carts and baskets, merchandise transportation carts and cages, airport carts, and customer guidance systems, as well as super market cash desks and service counters; and signage and promotion products. It also provides store equipment and furnishing products for super and mini markets, liquor and bakery, book, cosmetics, fashion, sports, home accessory, optics, toys, pet shop, electrical and electronics, DIY, and garden equipment stores. In addition, the company offers solutions for pharmacy equipment, furnishing, renovation, and design. Further, it trades in and distributes technical and DIY products. Vogiatzoglou Systems S.A. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Metamorfosi, Greece.

XYLEK.AT.summary: Interwood-Xylemporia A.T.E.N.E. engages in the manufacturing and trading of wood products in Greece. It offers soft timber and outdoor profiles; soft wood products, including spruce timber, pine timber, and soft American timber; melamines; hard wood products; panels comprising blockboards, HDF smaltines, MDF, OSB, veneer, veneer coated surfaces, and chipboards; gluelam and bilam beams; and flooring products, such as outdoor decks, laminate floors, pre-polished floors, soft wood floors, and indoor parquets. The company was formerly known as Xylemporia A.T.E.N.E. and changed its name to Interwood-Xylemporia A.T.E.N.E. in September 2009. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Eleusis, Greece.

XYLEP.AT.summary: Interwood-Xylemporia A.T.E.N.E. engages in the manufacturing and trading of wood products in Greece. It offers soft timber and outdoor profiles; soft wood products, including spruce timber, pine timber, and soft American timber; melamines; hard wood products; panels comprising blockboards, HDF smaltines, MDF, OSB, veneer, veneer coated surfaces, and chipboards; gluelam and bilam beams; and flooring products, such as outdoor decks, laminate floors, pre-polished floors, soft wood floors, and indoor parquets. The company was formerly known as Xylemporia A.T.E.N.E. and changed its name to Interwood-Xylemporia A.T.E.N.E. in September 2009. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Eleusis, Greece.

YALCO.AT.long_name: YALCO - Socrates D. Constantinou & Son S.A.
YALCO.AT.summary: YALCO - Socrates D. Constantinou & Son S.A. distributes and supplies household and hotel equipment in Greece. It distributes and supplies porcelain products that include glassware, cutlery, kitchen utensils, and table accessories under IONIA name; nonstick aluminum cookware products under Fest name; and interior design products under Trimar brand name, as well as operates stores under Super Home Bazaar brand name. The company offers solutions for tabletop, buffet, kitchen, lobby, room service, and conference equipment. It serves customers through department stores, hypermarkets, supermarkets, home stores, and stores with electrical appliances. The company also exports its products to 35 countries. YALCO - Socrates D. Constantinou & Son S.A. was founded in 1920 and is based in Kifissia, Greece.
